description.@en: You have lost an eye. It may have been from a childhood prank gone wrong, an abnormality from birth or the ‘devil’ made you gouge it out. Regardless, you may have a glass bead where it once was, wear an eye patch over the empty socket or simply let its hollowed-out recess go uncovered.

effect.@en: Reduce the Distance for all ranged weapons you use by -3 (to a minimum of 1).
